name: Breakthrough (charlotte.bennett)
description:
Info
Breakthrough is a platformer following the story of a young squirrel who embarks on a journey of self-discovery, world exploration and learning how to handle family traditions.

Features

  • A platformer utilizing the arrow keys to move and space to jump
  • Several unique NPCs that further the story through unique dialogue, interactable with the up arrow
  • Various platform types and puzzles which become more difficult as time goes on
  • Pixel art with multiple backgrounds that further the overall story 
  • Peaceful music and ambiance 

Credits
Developed by Charlotte Bennett
Music by Remaxim
Ambiance by Cinetony
Sound effects generated on https://sfxr.me/

Release Date: July 3rd 2022 
Contact: charliebennettxp@gmail.com
Price: Completely free!
